explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions using machine learning methods to establish a relationship model between debris flow-induced river blockage and key influencing factors.
explanations.classification: The study involves predicting whether debris flows will cause river blockages, which is a classification problem (binary classification of blockage or no blockage).
explanations.decision tree: The XGB model mentioned in the paper is based on decision trees (XGBoost is an ensemble method using decision trees as base learners).
